nodes.text: A vibro weapon was any bladed weapon whose blade was made more dangerous by the power of a rapid vibro-motor, which turned the wielder's slightest motion into a powerful and potentially lethal stroke. Types of vibro weapons included vibro-axes, vibrobayonets, vibroblades, vibrodaggers, vibro-knives, vibro-lances, vibroswords, vibro-voulges, vibrocleavers, and vibro-machetes.
